paper_abstract: We present, as a case study, a description of the partnership between an observatory (JCMT) and a data centre (CADC) that led to the development of the JCMT Science Archive (JSA). The JSA is a successful example of a service designed to use Virtual Observatory (VO) technologies from the start. We describe the motivation, process and lessons learned from this approach. (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Observatory/data centre partnerships and the VO-centric archive: The JCMT Science Archive experience
